name: kartooner-journal
description: Erik's personal journal site with flat file CMS

scripts.serve: node -e "const http = require('http'); const fs = require('fs'); const path = require('path'); const url = require('url'); const server = http.createServer((req, res) => { const parsedUrl = url.parse(req.url); const pathname = parsedUrl.pathname; let filePath = '.' + pathname; if (filePath === './') filePath = './index.html'; if (filePath === './journal') filePath = './journal/index.html'; if (filePath === './about') filePath = './about/index.html'; if (filePath === './voice-acting') filePath = './voice-acting/index.html'; if (filePath === './contact') filePath = './contact/index.html'; if (filePath === './thanks') filePath = './thanks/index.html'; if (filePath === './archive') filePath = './archive/index.html'; if (filePath === './coded') filePath = './coded/index.html'; if (filePath === './experiments') filePath = './experiments/index.html'; if (filePath === './experiments/paper-plane') filePath = './experiments/paper-plane/index.html'; const extname = String(path.extname(filePath)).toLowerCase(); const mimeTypes = { '.html': 'text/html', '.js': 'text/javascript', '.css': 'text/css', '.json': 'application/json', '.png': 'image/png', '.jpg': 'image/jpg', '.gif': 'image/gif', '.wav': 'audio/wav', '.mp4': 'video/mp4', '.woff': 'application/font-woff', '.ttf': 'application/font-ttf', '.eot': 'application/vnd.ms-fontobject', '.otf': 'application/font-otf', '.svg': 'application/image/svg+xml', '.woff2': 'font/woff2' }; const contentType = mimeTypes[extname] || 'application/octet-stream'; fs.readFile(filePath, (error, content) => { if (error) { if(error.code == 'ENOENT') { fs.readFile('./404.html', (err, content404) => { if (err) { res.writeHead(404); res.end('File not found'); } else { res.writeHead(404, { 'Content-Type': 'text/html' }); res.end(content404, 'utf-8'); } }); } else { res.writeHead(500); res.end('Server error'); } } else { res.writeHead(200, { 'Content-Type': contentType }); res.end(content, 'utf-8'); } }); }); server.listen(8000); console.log('Server running at http://localhost:8000/');"

author: Erik Sagen
